attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leicester Aero Club is one of the oldest, if not the oldest, aero clubs in the United Kingdom. It can be traced back to 1909. The aerodrome where they are based is threatened with closure, due to plans to build on the site. Being an aero club, it has to, by law, operate from a licensed aerodrome, of which it is the only one in Leicestershire. I ask you to sign this petition, in favour of keeping the UKs oldest aero club, and it's 500 strong membership base, in operation, from a very suitable base - Leicester Aerodrome!
